thread.title: Cler hotel is love!
thread.title_full: Cler hotel is love! - Review of Cler Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Bang V
title: Cler hotel is love!
text:
Cool hotel with nice Location, Exceptional service and Rooms are clean.
Hotel is modern and stylish and surrounded by cafes, fruit stand, delis, groceries and shops. Walking distance to the Eiffel tower and Metro station is just around the corner. Staff are friendly, accommodating and very helpful. Our room was cleaned every day and the bed is so comfy. Just excellent!
